references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a foundational model for novel view synthesis that heavily influenced the development of subsequent methods, including the one presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced Gaussian splatting, a crucial technique used in the target paper's approach, enabling efficient 3D scene representation and rendering.
This work presented a novel framework for joint 3D reconstruction and camera pose estimation, and the target paper leveraged aspects of its approach for pose-free reconstruction.

references.paper_title: Grounding image matching in 3D with MASt3R
references.reason: This paper introduced MASt3R, an improved version of DUSt3R, providing a strong baseline for pose-free reconstruction that is used for comparison in this work.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3D objects
references.reason: This paper introduced Objaverse, a large-scale dataset of 3D objects used in training and evaluating the methods in this paper, significantly contributing to the model's generalization capability.
